name: Wit's End
passive: Fray: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and steal 5 Magic Resistance from the target for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
tips: Wit's EndBasic Attack deals Bonus Damage +45% Attack Speed +45 Magic ResistanceAt Wit's End: Basic attacks deal 10-55 bonus magic damage.
While below 50%Health, dealing damage to an enemy champion heals you for (Melee 100%/Range 33%) of this effect's post-mitigation damage.

2800


This item is perfect for champions who want to deal sustained damage and have some defensive stats against magic damage threats.
It provides bonuses to attack speed and magic resistance, as well as adding magic damage to your auto-attacks, making it effective against magic-based threats.
The "While below 50% Health" effect heals you when dealing damage to an enemy champion, increasing survivability in fights.
